pages.text: "Eat rocks for breakfast~"$(br)"Listen, marble, I love you so much."$(br)"But it seems to represent more than just a piece of white stone..."$(br)"Forget it, who knows? The crispy crunch has long made people give up pondering the mysteries of taboos. Even if it's strange meat, it's fine."$(br)ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦ðŸ’¦$(br)"Not tasty, but it's good for you."

Grants the consumer Cannibal I (30s), Eternity I (30 min), Nourishment (5 min), Spell Mastery I (2 min).$(br)Can be eaten regardless of hunger. Eternity buff duration stacks. Eating this item while Cannibal is active increases Cannibal buff level by 1 and doubles its duration (max level 4, up to 10 min). Each time you eat, a $(4)Cannibalism~ message appears in chat.
